name: Exploaris: Vermis story
description:
Exploaris: Vermis story is a research-focused game that brings together all the best features you know and love from the Metroidvania genre.

Story-

Researcher Arisa arrives on a mysterious planet on which in the recent past a group of researchers disappeared.
help the main character figure out what happened to the researchers and solve the main secret of the planet.

Game Features-

- A large number of weapons and equipment hidden in caches in the big world of the game will help pave the way through the crowds of various monsters.
-Find abilities for the character to explore the world of the game.
-Choose your path - before you will be a great choice which path to go, which enemies to meet.
-Take a friend with you to make the game more fun.
-Great hand-drawn landscapes with extravagant parallax give rise to an extraordinary sense of the depth of the world.
-Upgrade characters using skill trees.

If you like the classic metroidvania gameplay, cute but scary creatures, epic adventures and beautiful worlds, then EXPLOARIS is waiting for you!
